p: Despite the well-known ethnopharmacological relevance of some essential oils derived from some species of the genus Pistacia ( P. atlantica Desf and P. integerrima J.L. Stewart ex Brandis) against several diseases, particularly those affecting the respiratory and the gastrointestinal tract [ 25, 26, 27, 28], no literature data concerning the hull essential oil composition and biological properties of Pistacia vera L., variety Bronte, are today available.
